author: Amy Furr
title: WATCH: Firemen Use Ladder to Surprise Firefighter Recovering from Coronavirus
description: A fireman in Miami-Dade, Florida, got the surprise of his life recently while recovering from his battle with the coronavirus.
content:
A fireman in Miami-Dade, Florida, got the surprise of his life recently while recovering from his battle with the coronavirus.
When the unnamed firefighter opened his hospital room window Friday morning, he could not believe what he saw, according to the Hen… [+1963 chars]
